extracted_playbook.title: Update MOVEit Transfer
extracted_playbook.description: Update MOVEit Transfer to a fixed version immediately to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Block Public Inbound RDP Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure public inbound RDP access to MOVEit Transfer server(s) is blocked to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Outbound Access
extracted_playbook.description: Limit outbound access to only known trusted endpoints from MOVEit Transfer server(s) to enhance security.
